title: rasec
author: rasec
content: Renminbi is the official currency of the People's Republic of China. It is the 2nd most important currency in the world right behind the USDPopularity of US Dollar backed stablecoins like USDT & USDC change the crypto landscape forever. Renminbi could be the next big one. Especially with "China narrative" picking up recentlyhttps://twitter.com/cz_binance/status/1661391542504902664RenminbiCoin.org = Renminbi + Bitcoin.org - straight to the point precise web domain nameFor more info just visit renminbicoin.org

comments.author: rasec
comments.body: Domain still open - can be flipped / re-listed for sale immediately if the buyer has contacts interested on launching a digital renminbi stablecoin projectHas massive potential especially with the China crypto adoption newsÂ  https://www.fpri.org/article/2023/06/china-is-doubling-down-on-its-digital-currency/For more info just visit the domain - it's hosted on namecheap marketplace which accepts bitcoin and other crypto supported by bitpay
